description: The main table for requisition entries. It contains mostly patient demographics and items that don't change much over time.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the requisition record.

columns.name: REQ_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: When a requisition is created for a non-participating submitter it is attached to a requisition grouper record rather than a patient record.

columns.name: REQ_PAT_CONTACT
columns.description: Stores the patient contact that this requisition is linked to.

columns.name: REQ_LAB_ID
columns.description: Stores the laboratory associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_SUBMITTER_ID
columns.description: Stores the submitter associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_SUBMITTER_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the submitter record.

columns.name: REQ_COLL_SITE_ID
columns.description: Used for toxicology submitters to track where the specimen was collected.

columns.name: REQ_COLL_SITE_ID_COL_SITE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection site.

columns.name: REQ_SUBM_PT_ID
columns.description: Stores the patient's ID at the submitter site.

columns.name: REQ_AUTH_PROV_ID
columns.description: The authorizing provider associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_EMPLOYER_ID
columns.description: Stores the patient's employer.

columns.name: REQ_EMPLOYER_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: REQ_EMPLOYER_PAT_ID
columns.description: Stores the patient's ID at the employer's site.

columns.name: REQ_STUDY_NUMBER
columns.description: Free text study number that can be entered during requisition entry

columns.name: REQ_INTERVAL_NUMBER
columns.description: Interval number often used in research studies

columns.name: REQ_ROOM_NUM
columns.description: Stores the room number associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_CHART_NUM
columns.description: Stores the chart number associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_COUNSELOR
columns.description: Stores the counselor associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_COUNSEL_PHN_NUM
columns.description: Stores the phone number for the counselor associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_PAT_CITY
columns.description: Stores the city of the patient associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_PAT_ZIP
columns.description: Stores the ZIP of the patient associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_PAT_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the county of the patient associated with this requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REQ_PAT_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the country of the patient associated with this requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REQ_BILL_TO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Designates which entity should be primarily responsible for the charges generated by the requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Client Bill


Patient Bill

columns.name: REQ_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The account that should be used for requisition billing.

columns.name: REQ_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: Coverage attached to the requisition for billing.

columns.name: REQ_COMMENT_ID
columns.description: Comments associated with the requisition

columns.name: TIME_COLL_TM
columns.description: Stores time collected entered in Express Requisition Entry. This item is only used temporarily until an specimen (OVS) record is created for the requisition (REQ) record.

columns.name: REQ_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Denotes whether the requisition is active, closed or canceled


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Completed


Canceled


Generating

columns.name: EXTERNAL_VISIT_ID
columns.description: External visit identifier of the requisition

columns.name: PATIENT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores patient gender entered during requisition entry.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: PATIENT_DOB
columns.description: Patient date of birth as it was entered during requisition entry.

columns.name: AGE
columns.description: Age of the requisition's patient

columns.name: AGE_UNITS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Units for the age of the requisition's patient


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Years


Months


Weeks


Days


Hours

columns.name: PATIENT_SSN
columns.description: SSN as it was entered during requisition entry.

columns.name: NON_HUMAN_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate the requisition's patient is non-human


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OUT_SPEC_DET_FLG_YN
columns.description:
This column determines whether Specimen Details have been saved for the Requisition. Note it is only used and set from the Web Outreach system- if Specimen Details are saved in another way, this column will not get updated until the next time the Specimen Details data is accessed from the Web Outreach system.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NON_HUMAN_YN

columns.name: ACUTE_CONVAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Item to store acute/convalescent flag entered in Express Req Entry. This item is only used temporarily until a Specimen (OVS) record is created for the Requisition (REQ) record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Acute


Convalescent

columns.name: DATE_ENTR_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the requisition was created in Requisition Entry. If the requisition was pre-printed, this item stores the date it was pre-printed, and once the requisition is received in the lab, the date it was received.

columns.name: STUDY_NUM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the study number associated with this requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INTERNAL_COMMENT_ID
columns.description: Stores internal comments related to the requisition. These are not sent on any external reports.

columns.name: REQUISITION_NAME
columns.description: This is the name of the Requisition record.

columns.name: REQ_PAT_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the house number of the patient associated with this requisition.

columns.name: REQ_PAT_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the district of the patient associated with this requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ORDERING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the ordering provider record for this row.

columns.name: ORD_PROV_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the ordering provider for this row.

columns.name: AUTH_PROV_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the authorizing provider for this row.

columns.name: PAT_BIRTH_TM
columns.description: Patient date and time of birth as it was entered during requisition entry.

columns.name: LAB_BILL_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The billing encounter to use by default for charges from this requisition's orders.

columns.name: ETHNIC_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The ethnic group category number for the requisition's patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SUBM_PAT_ALIAS_ID
columns.description: References an alternate form of a patient's name that is sent either by interface or paper requisition form from an outside submitter. This is used in reporting results back to the submitter. The name is stored in the Person Name database.

columns.name: ENTERING_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record who created this requisition. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: INSTANT_PAT_ASSOC_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the patient was associated with the requisition.

columns.name: GENDER_IDENTITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The gender identity category ID for the requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Transgender Female


Transgender Male


Other


Choose not to disclose

columns.name: SEX_ASGN_AT_BIRTH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The sex assigned at birth category ID for the requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Not recorded on birth certificate


Choose not to disclose


Uncertain

columns.name: AUTOPSY_REC_FROM
columns.description: Organization or person that an autopsy was received from on a requisition.

columns.name: AUTOPSY_GEST_AGE_WEEKS
columns.description: Gestational Age in Weeks of the deceased patient received on a requisition. This field is a free text field.

columns.name: AUTOPSY_MOMS_CHART
columns.description: Mother's Chart Number for still born from the autopsy requisition. This will be a free text string to accommodate any type of chart number (numeric, alphanumeric, etc.) from the sending organization.

columns.name: AUTOPSY_FNRL_HOME
columns.description: Stated funeral home for an autopsy that sent the specimens in a requisition.

columns.name: AUTOPSY_DEATH_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the date and time of death of the autopsy patient from a requisition.

columns.name: REQ_ORDER_DATE
columns.description: The date when the requisition was ordered.

columns.name: PAT_ADDR_HX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the type of address associated with this requisition.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Permanent


Temporary


Confidential


Correspondence


Next of Kin 


Subscriber Home

columns.name: AUTH_PROV_ADDR_IDENT
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider address associated with the requisition that is used to route results from the requisition to the Authorizing Provider.

columns.name: ORD_PROV_ADDR_IDENT
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider address associated with the requisition that is used to route results from the requisition to the Ordering Provider.

columns.name: ACCT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The account serial number associated with the requistion.

columns.name: HIDE_FRM_OTH_DEPT_YN
columns.description:
Specifies if this requisition is viewable only in the department it was created in. Indicates whether this requisition is viewable only in the department it was created in. 'Y' indicates that the requisition is hidden in other departments. 'N' or null indicate that the requisition is visible in other departments.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NON_HUMAN_YN
